      • saveActivity

        public MemberActivity saveActivity​(java.lang.String prop,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.Member mbr,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.Data data,
                                   com.jalios.jcms.workspace.Workspace ws,
                                   java.lang.String message,
                                   boolean checkSameActivity)
        Parameters:
        prop - the key of the activity
        mbr - the author of activity
        data - the data on which activity is related
        ws - the workspace where activity takes place
        message - the message
        checkSameActivity - weither new activity should be merged with latest one if they are same
        Returns:
        a new activity, or the last and updated activity, or null
